{"title":"Title (ServiceMonitoring)","type":"markdown","aggs":[],"params":{"fontSize":15,"openLinksInNewTab":false,"markdown":"#  **Service Monitoring Dashboard**
- Here are shown the `CPU` and `Memory Usage` of Services.
- Also `MaxFD`, `Running Threads`, `Response Time`, and `Queries` (active and pending)
"}}
